title: Ranked Borders
body: Hello, I've just gotten into a rank for the first time today. I've gotten into silver 4 but I see people with those ranked borders in the loading screen. When and how can I receive one? They look so cool! Thanks.

replies.body: Sadly, you just missed out on the Ranked Rewards that were awarded at the end of Season 4. In order to receive your Ranked Rewards you will have to wait until the end of Season 5.
You Just missed out unfortunately friend, Ranked rewards were handed out at the end of season 4. You'll have to wait a while I'm afraid.
in 12 months. You get them at the end of every season, and season 4 just ended. so yea..
